name: Individual Snowflake Christmas Card
description:
These special Christmas cards were designed for Folklore, an independent London design shop. The original designs were delicate paper collages. They were then transformed into printed cards by East London's Aldgate Press. 

Each card is A6 size and comes with a C5 ribbed kraft envelope. 
The cards are printed on 100% recycled paper. 

Choose from - Black, Grey or White. 
Alternatively, you can buy a set of six cards ( see separate listing). 

The cards are available to buy here or directly from Folklore - 193 Upper Street, Islington, London. I can be found there on Thursdays and Fridays, pop in and say hello! 
www.shopfolklore.com

name: Set of Six Snowflake Christmas Cards
description:
These special Christmas cards were designed for Folklore, an independent London design shop. The original designs were delicate paper collages. They were then transformed into printed cards by East London's Aldgate Press. 

Each card is A6 size and comes with a C5 ribbed kraft envelope. 
The cards are printed on 100% recycled paper. 

This set of six contains 2 Black, 2 Grey and 2 White Cards. They come packaged in a glassine envelope. Alternatively, you can buy the cards individually ( see separate listing). 

The cards are available to buy here or directly from Folklore - 193 Upper Street, Islington, London. I can be found there on Thursdays and Fridays, pop in and say hello! 
www.shopfolklore.com
